title: @Riot The One for All game mode proved me something...
body: That cass is a really shitty champion, everyone just fed with her and everyone was just complaining how unfun and lackluster she is, she does not have any early nor mid game at all, stupidly mana hungry, unfun and team dependent. Is there any plans to revert her rework and make her fun and viable? she really is garbage. She is even more mana hungry than Anivia.

replies.body: Q or E? you dont even know her abilities.

some characters are just much, much stronger than others.  played as fiddle vs. kench and got royally stomped like they were the globetrotters against a high school team, then played as darius vs. blitz and got a nearly unassisted quadrakill under their nexus turrets.

i really don't think OfA is meant to be serious, but it does highlight some huge scaling discrepancies between champs.
